enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have taken and passed RTVF 260-0.
title: SoC RTVF 360-0-25 Topics in Media Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is a performance class for writers. Writers in performance will learn the improvisation techniques that translate to successful creative careers in film and television, such as: deeper understanding of the interior of scenes; pacing, character, heightening, "game of the scene" and dialogue. In the second part of our class we put these skills together in longer forms as a way to study story structure. As a class we will attend an improv show in Chicago.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grading will be based on participation, collaboration, homework, midterm, quizzes on readings, a final writing project and an improvised final.
